programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Tracky's Special Invitation & I Want to Go to Sea
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - SCHOOL B promised to go outdoor activity with children. But he is worried because he cannot figure out any plan.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Move out! Battle in the Woods Part 1& Part2
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day in Brooms Town, Helly finds a trap in the wild animal safe zone. Detecting something strange might happen, rescue team members start to look across the forest.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Please Accept My Apology & Bruner's Birthday Secret
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, MAX goes to port to do Mr. Builder's errand. After finishing his job, MAX plays hide and seek with RIFTY.

programme.title: Robocar POLI SongSong Museum
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Down By The Station | Brooms Party | Wind The Bobbin up | Mary Had a Little Lamb | Magic Time

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Miracle at Tracky's Farm & Boom! Crash! Danger!
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day, when severe drought continues in Brooms town. TRACKY finds there is no water remain in the farm’s water tank. This is because of no rain drop for a long time.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - CAMP arrives Brooms town harbor one day earlier than planned! CAMP asks friends in harbor not to tell the others that CAMP is in Brooms town because he wants to see how much the friends in town welcome him.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Thank you, Roy & Disappearance of Spooky
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - ROY is busy when there is electricity inspection in Brooms town. On the other hand, POLI urgently requests help to ROY while he is cleaning up the falling rocks.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Helping Each Other When Things are Difficult & Tracky's Present
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - One day morning, Mr. Builder asks DUMP and BRUNER to go to harbor and bring the box filled with sand bags and nails. However, BRUNER complains that carrying is not his job even though DUMP asks him to help.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: The Brooms Town Railroad Station & Our Fabulous New Friend
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - BRUNER and DUMP fall into water. How Brooms town friends settle this complex situation?

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Mr. Builder starts repairing water pipe. He cautions to guard the place until the concrete dried out after pouring the cements into the hole.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Regular Checkup day & Fuss about Ghost
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Today is the Regular Checkup day. Spooky is too lazy to have a regular checkup. When Spooky comes to tow Posty to the electronic recharge station, fire comes up from Spooky's nose.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.sub-title: Try not to hurry & I want to be praised
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - School B is late and he is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for the short cut. However every roads are blocked because of roadwork.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - On the day with a lot of lightening, one of wheels in the Mr. Wheeler's store is stolen. As Poli detects this case, everyone is getting not to trust each other. Is it really true Broom's town has a thief?

programme.sub-title: Where are you going, Cleany? & Micky is angry!
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Cleany overcharges himself from the electronic recharge station which is out of order. Cleany runs so fast uncontrollably. Can Rescue Team stop Cleany?

programme.sub-title: I Love You, Grandpa & It's okay to make a mistake

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Broom’s town holds Boasting Competition. Dump is anxious about missing Bruner's super ball performance. While He is climbing up the hill with a lot of loads, he gets flat tire. Can Rescue team save Dump?

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Meet the rescuers, Robocar POLI! - Posty asks Cleany to deliver the package to the port unil 5 o'clock. Max also asks Cleany to clean the construction site. Cleany cleans the construction site and gets late for the delivery.
